title: [Cancer] A study of 118 observational studies, based upon around a million patients with a wide range of cancers, finds that taking a daily low-dose (75 or 81 mg/day) of aspirin was associated with a 20% reduction in deaths from cancer and in deaths from all causes
[Medicine] Adversity accelerates epigenetic aging in children with developmental delays, but positive parenting can reverse course and lead to lower levels of accelerated biological aging
